Name: Guillermo del Toro
Bio: Guillermo del Toro Gómez is a Mexican film director, producer, screenwriter, and author.

Name: Chris Buck
Bio: Christopher James Buck is an American film director known for co-directing Tarzan (1999), Surf's Up (2007) (which was nominated for the 2007 Oscar for Best Animated Feature), Frozen (2013), which won the Oscar for Best Animated Feature in 2014, and Frozen II (2019).

Name: Ridley Scott
Bio: Sir Ridley Scott is an English film director and producer.

Name: Andy Muschietti
Bio: Andrés Muschietti is an Argentine filmmaker who achieved wide recognition with the 2013 film Mama which he made with Neil Cross and his sister, producer and screenwriter Barbara Muschietti, based on the three-minute film of the same name.

Name: Jonathan Demme
Bio: Robert Jonathan Demme was an American film director, producer, and screenwriter of film and television who earned widespread acclaim.

Name: Tim Burton
Bio: Timothy Walter Burton is an American film director, producer, writer and artist.
